scripts.start: budo -p 9999 -o --dir public/ src/main.coffee:assets/js/main.js --live -- -t coffeeify -t glslify | garnish
scripts.libs: mkdirp public/assets/js && browserify src/libs-main.js | uglifyjs -cm > public/assets/js/libs.js
scripts.compile: mkdirp public/assets/js && browserify -t coffeeify -t glslify src/main.coffee | uglifyjs -cm > public/assets/js/main.js
scripts.deploy: npm run-script libs && npm run-script compile && node deploy.js
scripts.build: npm run-script app-libs && npm run-script deploy && node build.js
